casebody.data:
REGINA PERRY v. M. L. MERSHON and MARIE MERSHON, his wife. 17 So. (2nd) 552

January Term, 1944

April 14, 1944 Division A Morrow & Mayes and L. J. Cushman, for appellant. McKay, Dixon & DeJarnette, for appellees. PER CURIAM:

From a consideration of the whole record, we find no reversible error, hence the judgment appealed from is affirmed.

BUFORD, C. J., TERRELL, CHAPMAN and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
